deal_id: Port Vila: Breakas Beach Resort Vanuatu
title: Port Vila: Breakas Beach Resort Vanuatu
inclusions_evidence: Includes 6 nights at Breakas Beach Resort - Tropical continental breakfast daily. - Welcome fruit cocktail on arrival. - Introductory scuba-diving lesson in the resort pool. - Local Cooking class. - Guided Cultural Tour of the local village. - Use of kayak, SUP & snorkeling equipment - FREE Wi-Fi in the lobby, bar & restaurant area Return airport transfers Bonus - Includes 1 FREE nights^ Per Person, from $1,095

flights.assumed_route: Most likely from New Zealand (e.g. Auckland AKL) or nearest origin to Port Vila (VLI) return

items.label: Guided cultural tour of local village
Use of kayak, SUP & snorkeling equipment

other.notes: Tourism levy of VUV200 per fare per day payable direct (not included). Package mentions 1 free night already included in advertised cost.

reasoning: Package does not include flights but includes substantial extras (welcome cocktail, breakfast, scuba trial, cooking class, cultural tour, equipment use and return transfers) plus a free night; without live supplier and OTA price checks I cannot reliably compute DIY total, so numeric comparisons are null. Given the inclusions and free night for 6 nights in Vanuatu, this appears to be strong value for a hotel-only package.
additional_notes: I could not perform live searches on booking.com/Expedia or supplier sites from the provided data, so hotel and flight cost fields are left null. Tourism levy VUV200 per fare per day is payable direct by guest (from deal text).
